sqlMap.insert: insert into transaction_outsource (transaction_outsource_id,client_id,employee_id,start_date, end_date,is_gross, fee, created_by, created_date, changed_by, changed_date) values (#transactionOutsourceId#,#clientId#,#employeeId#,to_date(#startDate#,'MM/dd/yyyy'), to_date(#endDate#,'MM/dd/yyyy'),#isGross#,#fee#,#createdBy#,sysdate,null,null)
sqlMap.update: update transaction_outsource set end_date = #endDate#, fee = #fee#, is_gross = #isGross#, changed_by = #changedBy#, changed_date = sysdate where transaction_outsource_id = #transactionOutsourceId#
sqlMap.select: select transaction_outsource_id as transactionOutsourceId, o.client_id as clientId, c.name as clientName, o.employee_id as employeeId, e.name as employeeName, to_char(start_date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as startDate, to_char(end_date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as endDate, is_gross as isGross, fee as fee from transaction_outsource o join master_client c on (o.client_id=c.client_id) join master_employee e on (o.employee_id=e.employee_id) where transaction_outsource_id = #transactionOutsourceId#

select clientId, clientName, extract(year from add_months(trunc(startDate,'MM'),-1) ) || trim(to_char(extract(month from add_months(trunc(startDate,'MM'),-1) ),'00')) as startDate from ( select t.client_id as clientId, c.name as clientName, min(t.start_date) as startDate from transaction_outsource t, master_client c where c.client_id = t.client_id group by t.client_id, c.name )
